mapper.select: SELECT NEW_ORDER, SHIPPING, CONFIRMED, SUM_ORDER, SUM_SETTLE FROM (SELECT COUNT(O.ORDER_NO) AS "NEW_ORDER" FROM ORDERS O JOIN PRODUCT P ON (O.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN SELLER S ON (S.SELLER_NO = P.SELLER_NO) WHERE ORDER_DATE = SYSDATE AND S.SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo}), (SELECT COUNT(O.ORDER_NO) AS "SHIPPING" FROM ORDERS O JOIN PRODUCT P ON (O.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN SELLER S ON (S.SELLER_NO = P.SELLER_NO) WHERE ORDER_STATUS = 1 AND ORDER_DATE = SYSDATE AND S.SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo}), (SELECT COUNT(O.ORDER_NO) AS "CONFIRMED" FROM ORDERS O JOIN PRODUCT P ON (O.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN SELLER S ON (S.SELLER_NO = P.SELLER_NO) JOIN SETTLEMENT ST ON (O.ORDER_NO = ST.ORDER_NO) WHERE ORDER_STATUS = 3 AND SETTLE_DATE = SYSDATE AND S.SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo}), (SELECT NVL(SUM(ORDER_PRICE), 0) AS "SUM_ORDER" FROM ORDERS O JOIN PRODUCT P ON (O.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN SELLER S ON (S.SELLER_NO = P.SELLER_NO) WHERE ORDER_DATE = SYSDATE AND S.SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo}), (SELECT NVL(SUM(SETTLE_DEPT), 0) AS "SUM_SETTLE" FROM SETTLEMENT S JOIN ORDERS O ON (S.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO) WHERE SETTLE_DATE = SYSDATE AND S.SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo})

SELECT PAYMENT_BILL, PAYMENT_COUNT, REFUND_COUNT FROM (SELECT NVL(SUM(PAYMENT_BILL), 0) AS "PAYMENT_BILL" , COUNT(PAYMENT_NO) AS "PAYMENT_COUNT" FROM PAYMENT P JOIN ORDERS O ON (P.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON (P.PRODUCT_NO = O.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN SELLER S ON (S.SELLER_NO = P.SELLER_NO) WHERE PAYMENT_DATE = SYSDATE AND S.SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo}), (SELECT COUNT(PAYMENT_NO) AS "REFUND_COUNT" FROM PAYMENT P JOIN ORDERS O ON (P.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT P ON (P.PRODUCT_NO = O.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN SELLER S ON (S.SELLER_NO = P.SELLER_NO) WHERE PAYMENT_DATE = SYSDATE AND S.SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo} AND PAYMENT_STATUS = 'N')
